body.name: Mini Projector with WiFi and Bluetooth 5.1, 9500L Portable Movie Projector 1080P and 4K Supported, YABER V5 2023 Updated Mini Home Theater Projector with Tripod and Bag for Phone/PC/TV Stick-Premium

deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 8 hrs 4 mins
features: ★【Enhanced Brightness and Color】YABER projector V5 has updated the chip to BASIC 2.0 and an enhanced brightness of 9500 Lumens,1080P and 4K supported, bringing clear and colorful pictures. Mini projector uses diffuse reflection imaging technology to greatly reduce direct blue light, which is much gentler on the eyes, more comfortable viewing experience compared to TVs.

★【Lag-free】5G/2.4G Dual-band WiFi transmission and Bluetooth connectivity offers you much smoother and lag free online video streaming experience. Simplified setup operations, projector with wifi and bluetooth can easily project onto any flat surface such as walls, screen, ceilings, etc.

★【Built-in HiFi Speaker & Wide Compatibility】The built-in HiFi speaker of outdoor projector can provide powerful and clear audio that bring you immersive audio-visual enjoyment. Support Bluetooth, USB 2.0, HDMI, AV, VGA, 3.5mm Audio, you can easily connect your personal speaker, headphones, phone, TV Box, fire stick, PC, chromecast to smart projector, customize yourself audiovisual experience.

★【Mini Portabe Projector and Zoom Function】With a large 250-inch display, compact and lightweight, a great choice for outdoor movie projector. With the Yaber V5 projector, you can host backyard movie nights under the stars with friends and family anytime, or enjoy outdoor cinema fun in your RV. Support the remote control to easily reduce the screen size from 100% to 50%, and the bedroom theater will also be within reach.

★【Complete Accessories & Lifetime Customer Service】The thoughtfully included carrying case, projector stand, and cleaning kit are fully equipped to provide you with more convenience, 1080p projector is a great gift to your lover. YABER offers a 3-year warranty and a lifetime of worry-free customer service. Any problems, please feel free to contact us 7x24 online.
body.description: YABER PRO V5 projector with WiFi and Bluetooth is an upgraded 9000L portable movie projector witch supports 5G&2.4G Duan-band WiFi and bluetooth 5.0. It's a native 720P mini Home Theater Projector with Tripod and Bag, supports 1080P and 4K resolution, compatible with IOS/Android/HDMI/PC/TV Stick/laptop.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Choose Yaber V5 Projector--Add Fun and Warmth To Your Life！ For brand--Happiness is the source of life. Yaber hopes to bring happiness to thousands of families and entertainment lovers around the world with a variety of entertainment projector products. Believe Yaber V5 is the warmest gift for your family and friends! Excellent WiFi Bluetooth Projector--Yaber V5 first adopted the 2.4G&5G dual-band WiFi for mini portable projector. Its advanced function of 5.1 Bluetooth makes it stand out in mini projector. Exquisite Mini Projector--This mini projector has a unique home-style appearance make it both beautiful and practical. WiFi Portable Projector With Vivid&Clear Image Quality--This mini projector possesses 9500 L brightness, 10000:1 contrast and 1080p vedio supported will definitely help you to explore a new magical world! Extra Gift! --In order to make it convenient for customers to watch movies and improve their movie-watching experience, we also put a free carry bag and tripod stand in the package~

Specifications Brightness: 9500 Lumens Aspect Ratio: 4: 3/16: 9 / Auto Projection Size: 40-150 Inches (most suitable projection size) Zoom function: 100% -50% Speaker: stereo with SRS,built-in Bluetooth 5.1 Projection Method: Front/Rear on Desk, Front/ Rear on Ceiling Wireless Connectivity with Smartphone YABER V5 projector can mirror movies/photos from smartphones or other devices to the big screen wireless via WIFI. Adoption of advanced 5G WiFi, the transmission speed is three times faster than projectors with 2.4G WiFi on the market. Warm Tips： The WiFi function doesn't support protected Apps from the smartphone, because of copyright, such as Netflix, Amazon Prime Video,Disney+, and Hulu. But you can watch the movies on Netflix, Disney+, Prime Video, Hulu, via connect a Laptop, Chromecast, Wireless Dongle, TV Stick or Roku.

5.1 Bluetooth & Build-in HiFi speaker Yaber V5 portable projector built-in the newest Bluetooth chip which can easily connect Bluetooth, headphones, or other audio equipment. With 5W Hi-Fi stereo surround dual speakers, whether using it indoors or outdoors, the powerful speakers give you an immersive experience. Digital Zoom -50% Function With the zoom function in Yaber V5 outdoor projector, It can reduce the image up to 50% of the original length and width with the remote control. With this innovative function, no need to adjust the HD projector distance frequently to match the screen size. It also can be used with a ceiling mount and stand tripod. Safety Control Design&Dual IR receivers Yaber V5 mini projector uses the built-in front and rear dual infrared receivers for the first time, which can fully cover various remote control blind spots around the fuselage, effectively solving the remote control failure and making the placement of the projector freer.

Small and Portable Body with Free Carrying Bag and Tripod The size of the YABER home projector is 8.2 x 6.6 x 3 inches, which is small and light.The free carrying bag and stand tripod are convenient for your travel and outdoor activity, which is also the high-quality life and entertainment experience that YABER wants to convey. Large Screen Brings Immersive Experience The imaging of the YABER projector can reach up to 250 inches. Large screen brings you an immersive experience. Bring YABER V5 and enjoy the movie night with your family and friends. Wide Compatibility Equipped with 1*HDMI ports, 1*USB ports, AV port and a 3.5mm headphone jack, V5 can be easily connected with TV Box, Amazon Fire TV Stick, Chrome-cast, PC, laptop, tablet, external speakers, X box, DVD player, card reader, USB stick, media players, iPad, iPhone, Android smartphone. The latest built-in Bluetooth 5.0 chip can connect with your Bluetooth speaker any time freely.

Warm Tips： 1.It will perform the best effect under a relatively darkroom environment. 2.To make a clear picture, please slowly adjust the focus ring to get the best image performance. (If it is still blurry, Please put the projector lens completely perpendicular to the screen, and the tilt angle cannot exceed ±15° horizontally) 3.If there is no sound when playing videos like Netflix, turn off Dolby sound on your connected devices or apps. (Settings > Display & Sounds > Audio > Dolby Digital Output > and then turn Dolby Digital (OFF) 4.Due to app copyright, watch the movies on Netflix, Disney+, Prime Video, Hulu, only via connect a Laptop, Chromecast, Wireless Dongle, TV Stick or Roku.The WiFi function doesn't support protected those Apps from the smartphone. 5.If you find black spots on the projection screen or dust in the lens, please email YABER Service to get the black spot removal video. 6. Bluetooth can only transmit Audio, but not Videos. If the Bluetooth can not connected, please first confirm whether the Bluetooth is connected to other devices, if it is not,please email YABER Service to help.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So I got this projector for family and friends night and I must say the picture and sound quality are both great highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect backyard projector
reviews.reviewText: I’ve always wanted a backyard projector! I’m so happy to get my hands on this 1080p backyard projector. Some things I love about it;•the brightness of the display (hard to see in the picture but it’s bright)! **Pictured is with lights on/off•1080p means there is a clear picture! It’s better than my (older style) tv. Not sure why other comments say it’s not clear? ***Pictured my projector is paired with a 100” screen and is about 11ft away from the screen. It can go up to 150” screen size!•SUPER easy setup with clear instructions. You’ll need batteries for the remote to get started. Took me all but 5 minutes to set up my screen and place my projector on the tripod (which it comes with).• Easily adjustable.• FUN for my whole family! We plan on watching many movies and tv shows out here this summer!10/10 I would say for the price and quality.•This would make an excellent gift for a movie lover. The packaging was beautiful too!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We have been looking for a backyard projector, plan is to watch movies while we are floating in our pool at night. This does not disappoint. Easy to set up, very bright, excellent definition, and the colors are so vivid! It feels like we are looking at a huge tv screen. Love this and it’s well worth the price. Highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Muy mala calidad de imagen, sin foco y poco color

This is just such an amazing projector! The result was a delightful surprise! Not only is it user friendly, the performance is also undoubtedly superior to other projectors. There is also an amazing speaker within it and the mirroring functionality is awesome to be quickly able to show anything on the projector from your phone. I highly recommend this for anyone looking for a small projector for their room or even to use it on camping or anything else you'd like. The audio in itself is loud enough too, and the cooling fan is super quiet. With its 4k resolution capabilities, there's no need to buy an expensive tv that is fraction of the screen size for many times the price as this. This projector has it all!

I purchased this projector to use it to project movies and youtube videos from my bed settings. The device is pretty nice looking and looks solid. When projecting, the menu has a very simple layout for video, sound, picture settings, and it's easy to navigate the menu and set it up. The video sound can be played too as there is an internal speaker in the device. The sound quality is decent but I can also connect to a bluetooth speaker very easily for better sounds. The picture and video quality is satisfying given the price for this projector; I mainly use it to project movies or Netflix from the bed with no tv. I like the fact we can zoom smaller or larger for the projection. Lastly, it can play more than 4 hours continuously for me. I highly recommend the product to anyone who prefers projecting on a wall than getting a big tv.

The media could not be loaded. For a 720p projector the image is bright, good contrast and clear, even in the broad daylight!Wireless Bluetooth speaker was easy to connect, but there is a tiny delay in audio. When you have it wired with the provided AUX cable, there is no delay, it's perfect. The 3D lens adjustment is neat but it makes the corners of the image fringe/blur, so you want to keep the projector flat/parallel with the screen. It doesn't have digital keystone, so you cannot put the projector off axis. But overall it is great for the price, especially for travel since it's so compact!

The media could not be loaded. I got this projector a few days ago and I love it! You can set it up almost anywhere as long as you have a wall outlet and a nice surface to project on! A few minutes later, you have a big display to watch movies or to play games with friends on. The integrated speakers sounds pretty good but you can also link your own sound system! The best thing about it is that it comes with a pouch to carry it in with all the things you need! Lens cleaning supplies, controller, tripod and cables! All that for a quarter of the price of a good television! Truly impressed.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great little home projector for the price
reviews.reviewText: We use this for our kids group and it is a great little projector. It would be nice if the light was brighter as greater distances get harder to see unless you are in a very dark room. The sound quality is good but not very loud.
